column5: Can anyone recommend a place to stay on or near lake st clair? Looking to get a few days of fishing in with some friends. Search of the internet didn't return much.

google rooms in Chatham it is your best bet.  The Saxony Motel in Chatham is cheap and very clean. We got a room there last year for 45 bucks for the night with a continental breakfast,2 queen beds,satelite tv and free wifi.
Belle River Yacht Club, and Petit Dragon Motel, both in Belle River.
There is a place across from Mitchel's Bay Marine unfortunately I forget the name of it. The rooms are cheap and the place is clean

Parkside cabins in Mitchelles Bay is a great place to stay if your sharing a room with a few guys and it's attached to a good diner. Holiday in in Chatham has lots of parking space if your trailering a boat and is a nice clean 3 1/2 star. The Petite Dragon is cheap with good location, food walking distance away.  Quality Suites downtown windsor is a great spot but you have to arrange docking at a marina and parking for your trailer at the marina

what ya fishin for. walleyes stay in Windsor. muskies .le petit dragon. green acres belle river.. Windsor has a great ramp and parking,as belle river .,also puce river sandbar restaurant... if ya need help pm me.

Sorry for the late reply but thank you for the responses. We will be fishing for muskies at the mouth of the Thames Saturday. Depending how that goes we will see which part of the lake we fish sunday. Ill be in a red lund rebel if anyones out there feel free to say hi.  -Mike
